spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout mismatch between 2D plan and 3D render. (E2) Bed-1 is shown at top/center in 3D, but in plan Bed-1 is on the right side with an adjacent deck and attached toilet; this whole right-side suite is not represented correctly. (E1) Both decks/balconies shown in plan (living-side deck and Bed-1 deck) are missing in 3D. (E1/E2) Toilets are not correctly placed: plan has two toilets (C.TOI near Bed-2 and TOI-1 near Bed-1); 3D does not clearly show both in correct locations. (E2/E3) Door placements/orientations are not modeled per plan; most door leaves/swings are absent and openings do not correspond to the plan’s entry/foyer and bathroom doors. (E2) Window placement is substantially reduced: plan has multiple exterior windows and deck openings; 3D shows only a few windows and omits balcony/door openings. (E4) Room proportions and circulation are distorted: the long living/dining (15' x 21'4") and the foyer/entry corridor are not preserved; spaces appear compressed and re-partitioned.

structural_fidelity.notes: (E1) Missing rooms/elements: both decks, clear foyer, and at least one toilet arrangement as per plan are not faithfully present. (E5) Hallucinated/incorrect partitions: an extra room-like space at the top-right in 3D (with windows and a console) does not correspond to any labeled room in the plan; the right-side suite is reconfigured. (E2) Adjacency relationships are incorrect: in plan Bed-1 connects to TOI-1 and a deck; in 3D this adjacency is not maintained. (E2) Kitchen/utility adjacency is incorrect: plan shows a dedicated utility (5' x 7'8") connected to the kitchen; 3D shows a different right-side service space that does not match location/shape. Wall thickness appears visually consistent, but the wall layout itself diverges heavily from the plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: (E2) Furniture does not map to plan-specific placements: living seating/dining are generic and not aligned to the plan’s intended zones and circulation. (E4) Furniture scaling feels broadly plausible, but because room sizes/proportions are wrong, relative scale-to-room is inconsistent. (E1) No fixtures/fittings consistent with two bathrooms are shown.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, readable isometric with generally good lighting and simple materials. Camera isometric is acceptable, geometry is mostly clean with minimal artifacts. However, (E6) the scene is oversimplified (missing doors, balcony edges/thresholds, bathroom fixtures), reducing architectural clarity and making it less faithful to an orthographic/isometric interpretation of the provided plan.

detected_errors.description: Both decks/balconies shown in the 2D plan are missing in the 3D render.
Bed-1 suite is misplaced/reconfigured: in plan it is on the right with adjacent deck and nearby/attached toilet; in 3D it appears at top/center without the correct adjacency.
Toilet count/layout is not faithfully represented; plan has two toilets (C.TOI and TOI-1), but 3D does not clearly show both in correct locations.
Kitchen + Utility relationship is incorrect; plan has a dedicated utility directly connected to kitchen, but 3D shows a different service space placement/shape.
Window placement is substantially incorrect; many exterior windows/openings from the plan are omitted in the 3D render.
Door placement/embedding is incorrect or missing; most plan doors are not modeled with correct locations or swings.
Room proportions and circulation are distorted; the long living/dining and foyer/corridor dimensions are not preserved.
Hallucinated/extra room-like partitioning at the top-right of the 3D render that does not correspond to any labeled room in the 2D plan.
Rendering/modeling simplification artifacts: missing bathroom fixtures, missing door elements, and simplified thresholds reduce architectural legibility.
